## ğŸš€ Quick Start

```bash
# Install
git clone https://github.com/kosty-cloud/kosty.git
cd kosty && ./install.sh

# Configure AWS
aws configure

# Run audit
kosty audit --output json

# View dashboard
open dashboard/index.html
```
